words.description:
In Cantonese, {唔} is *no* and {該} is *should*, so {唔該} is *not should* or basically *no need*.

In Mandarin, {謝} is *thank*, so {謝謝} is *thank thank* or *thanks*.
{多} is *many* or *much*, and {謝} is *thank* (same as in the Mandarin {謝謝} for *thanks*), so {多謝} is *many thanks*, or *thank you very much*.

In Cantonese, {唔使} is *no need*, and {客氣} is *courtesy*, so {唔使客氣} is *no need for the courtesy*.

{不} is *not* or *no*, so {不客氣} is similarly *no need for the courtesy*.
